The Class ManhattanMetric implements a manhattan metric also known as taxicab geometry.

margin - Static variable in class gui.GUISettings
The margin for the center method of the draw panel and the method which inserts a certain number of randomly generated points onto the draw panel.

minimumHeight - Static variable in class gui.GUISettings
The minimum height of the main window.
minimumModelRange - Static variable in class gui.GUISettings
The difference between the maximum x and the minimum x coordinate and the maximum y and the minimum y coordinate of the view translated into the coordinate system of the model can can not be smaller or equal this value.
minimumWidth - Static variable in class gui.GUISettings
The minimum width of the main window.

minY - Variable in class usecases.RandomPointsEvent
The minimum y coordinate for the randomly generated points in the coordinate system of the model.
MOUSE_ENTERED - Enum constant in enum class usecases.DrawPanelEventType
The mouse has entered the draw panel.
MOUSE_EXCITED - Enum constant in enum class usecases.DrawPanelEventType
The mouse has left the draw panel.
MOUSE_MOVED - Enum constant in enum class usecases.DrawPanelEventType
The mouse was moved.
mouseCoordinates - Variable in class gui.StatusBar
The label which displays the mouse coordinates.
mouseOffsetX - Variable in class gui.DrawPanel
The x coordinate of the mouse minus initial x coordinate DrawPanel.initialDragX.
mouseOffsetY - Variable in class gui.DrawPanel
The y coordinate of the mouse minus initial y coordinate DrawPanel.initialDragY.
mousePositionIsOverPanel - Variable in class controllers.DrawPanelController
True if the mouse pointer is above the draw panel, false otherwise.
mouseRadius - Static variable in class gui.GUISettings
The maximum distance in the view coordinate system a point needs to have from the mouse pointer to be selected.
mouseX - Variable in class controllers.DrawPanelController
The x coordinate of the mouse pointer if it is above the draw panel.
mouseX - Variable in class usecases.DrawPanelEvent
The x coordinate of the mouse pointer in the coordinate system of the model.
mouseY - Variable in class controllers.DrawPanelController
The y coordinate of the mouse pointer if it is above the draw panel.
mouseY - Variable in class usecases.DrawPanelEvent
The y coordinate of the mouse pointer in the coordinate system of the model.
